title: Schedule Lease Renewal
description: A tenant's lease is expiring in 90 days. The property manager needs to initiate the renewal process.

tasks.description: Identify all tenants whose leases are expiring in the next 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report of all upcoming lease expirations.

tasks.description: For a specific tenant, generate a lease renewal offer with the new rental rate based on market analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: A lease renewal offer letter is created with a 5% rent increase.

tasks.description: Send the renewal offer to the tenant and create a follow-up task for 14 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The offer is emailed to the tenant and a task is created in the system to check for a response.
